body_content.explanation: a device that makes light waves move in one direction only, or mainly in one direction, used, for example, in cameras and electronic devices:
examples: It's possible to create an outdoor-readable Tablet PC by using an appropriate LCD technology coupled with appropriate polarizers and filters.
The light is bright enough on its own, without the need for polarisers, colour filters and backlights.

body_content.explanation: a person or thing that causes something, especially people or their opinions, to divide into two completely opposing groups:
examples: This 11-track album will stand out as an anomaly, a polarizer among fans.
He was a polariser: so much so that he never won more than 55% of the vote in North Carolina.
